TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_nu_Ai-ji_a_micidekay_a_kungku, title = nu_Ai-ji_a_micidekay_a_kungku, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/nu_Ai-ji_a_micidekay_a_kungku} }

S.FORM: nu Ai-ji a micidekay a kungku kakiliman nu Ai-ji a micidekay a kungku malasumamadan a Ai-ji nu micidekay a kungku. namakay i kulit tu sakatineng tu nu kakawusan kay yadah, nu sumamadan a Ai-ji a tademaw sakatinengan tu kapah tu nu sakatinengan i kitakit, u micidekay a kungku mahida u sumamadan a kyukay nu Ai-ji u sakahenulan kyuni. Ai-j micidekay a kungku i sumamadan a Ai-ji nasulitan atu nalimaan hina tahekal, nanu linga tu katukuh i sumamadan a Ai-ji tu apuyu'ay a kungku, nu kyukay a lisin micukaymas tu bangcalay a sulit nu dadiw, sulit nu sapibaung, kuni pisulit nu mapatayay atu u sasalisinay a tuud maadih amin I Ai-ji nu micidekay a kungku nu adingu. nika kina kungku hina liwaliwasak, nayay ku malucekay a micidekay a kungku tu nu nipisulit, u nu duma aca ku yadahay nu micidekay a kungku i dumadumaan. nilacul nitatengan sakay i kitakit Ma-a-te "Ma-a-te" (Amuhuwan a kamu:maat/ma'at, nu Ai-ji a kamu: m3ˁt) i sumamadan a Ai-ji u milihayay tu i kitakit a misakasasilac. Ma-a-te misabaluhay a kitakit tu sayaway atu liwliway nu nika sasipudan. ci Ma-a-te malaaadingan nu tademaw ku wayway nida, misasengi tu hekalay a kitakit nu nika sasumasumadan malineng, uyni u Ay-jiay a tademaw salipahakay ku nikaudip. sakay i tini i kakawusan anu lacusay atu kapahay mamikuan tu kitakit, u kakawusan a wayway nu Ay-ci a micidakay a kungku malasakaudip nu kitakit tu nikalalineng. sakay i Ay-ci a tademaw sa, i sakaudip miading tu "Ma-a-te" ku hungt nu Ay-ci atu Falaw. i caay kalecaday a micidekay a kungku, u hungti nu caayay kalecad a kakawusan nu wawa, sisa Falaw nu kasumamadan a Ay-ci a tademaw i hekal nu sakaudipay mikutayay a tademaw, ba'ket ku abala mikuwan tu sakaudip, kyu palatademaw tu sakakapah nika udipan atu nu kyukayay a lisin. u wayway nu kitakit i labu nu Ai-ji a micidekay a kungku, hekal nu kitakit u maibukay a nanum,"nanu u mahidaay a nunum", mahida u kakawusan "Nu-en". mahida u lalad nu mapipiay, ya wayway mahida u lalad nu kakawusan ci "Kay-pu", matabu tu hekal, mahida a wayway u takupuwan nu kakawusan ci "Nu-te". takupuwan atu lalad nu hanhan a kakawusan nu malaliyasay. mahida u tademawan nu cilal a kakawusan ci "La" i demiad micaliway tu takupuwan, mulakuwit tu udip ni "Nu-te", ya likad papelid tu hekalay, nu kitakit manengil tu.nu labiay a kakawusan ci "La" miawas tu enal micumud tu di'tuan, i dikudan nu makasasa, idaw ku cacayay a "nanu mahidaay a nunum" malaliten tu micidekay a kenis, malaliyun tu ku tademaw nu makasasa atu makapabaway. i sananal, ci "La" mulakuwit tu di'tuan a kakawusan pasawali tu ti-ping-sian misapaluhay tu waliay. nitatengan tu tuki nitatengan tu patay sapadihing a cudad nadikudan nika patay masaybang tu satangahan a micidakay a kungku u sayaway a micidekay a kungku u sayaway a micidekay a kungku nu He-li-aw-pu-li-si u sayaway a micidekay a kungku nu He-er-mu-pu-li-si u sayaway a micidekay a kungku nu Meng-fei-si u sayaway a micidekay a kungku nu Ti-pi-si

no Ai-ji a micidekay a kongko kakiliman no Ai-ji a micidekay a kongko malasomamadan a Ai-ji no micidekay a kongko. namakay i kolit to sakatineng to no kakawosan kay yadah, no somamadan a Ai-ji a tademaw sakatinengan to kapah to no sakatinengan i kitakit, o micidekay a kongko mahida o somamadan a kyokay no Ai-ji o sakahenolan kyoni. Ai-j micidekay a kongko i somamadan a Ai-ji nasolitan ato nalimaan hina tahekal, nano linga to katokoh i somamadan a Ai-ji to apoyo'ay a kongko, no kyokay a lisin micokaymas to bangcalay a solit no dadiw, solit no sapibaong, koni pisolit no mapatayay ato o sasalisinay a tood maadih amin I Ai-ji no micidekay a kongko no adingo. nika kina kongko hina liwaliwasak, nayay ko malocekay a micidekay a kongko to no nipisolit, o no doma aca ko yadahay no micidekay a kongko i domadomaan. nilacol nitatengan sakay i kitakit Ma-a-te "Ma-a-te" (Amohowan a kamo:maat/ma'at, no Ai-ji a kamo: m3ˁt) i somamadan a Ai-ji o milihayay to i kitakit a misakasasilac. Ma-a-te misabalohay a kitakit to sayaway ato liwliway no nika sasipodan. ci Ma-a-te malaaadingan no tademaw ko wayway nida, misasengi to hekalay a kitakit no nika sasomasomadan malineng, oyni o Ay-jiay a tademaw salipahakay ko nikaodip. sakay i tini i kakawosan ano lacosay ato kapahay mamikoan to kitakit, o kakawosan a wayway no Ay-ci a micidakay a kongko malasakaodip no kitakit to nikalalineng. sakay i Ay-ci a tademaw sa, i sakaodip miading to "Ma-a-te" ko hongt no Ay-ci ato Falaw. i caay kalecaday a micidekay a kongko, o hongti no caayay kalecad a kakawosan no wawa, sisa Falaw no kasomamadan a Ay-ci a tademaw i hekal no sakaodipay mikotayay a tademaw, ba'ket ko abala mikowan to sakaodip, kyo palatademaw to sakakapah nika odipan ato no kyokayay a lisin. o wayway no kitakit i labo no Ai-ji a micidekay a kongko, hekal no kitakit o maibokay a nanom,"nano o mahidaay a nonom", mahida o kakawosan "No-en". mahida o lalad no mapipiay, ya wayway mahida o lalad no kakawosan ci "Kay-po", matabo to hekal, mahida a wayway o takopowan no kakawosan ci "No-te". takopowan ato lalad no hanhan a kakawosan no malaliyasay. mahida o tademawan no cilal a kakawosan ci "La" i demiad micaliway to takopowan, molakowit to odip ni "No-te", ya likad papelid to hekalay, no kitakit manengil to.no labiay a kakawosan ci "La" miawas to enal micomod to di'toan, i dikodan no makasasa, idaw ko cacayay a "nano mahidaay a nonom" malaliten to micidekay a kenis, malaliyon to ko tademaw no makasasa ato makapabaway. i sananal, ci "La" molakowit to di'toan a kakawosan pasawali to ti-ping-sian misapalohay to waliay. nitatengan to toki nitatengan to patay sapadihing a codad nadikodan nika patay masaybang to satangahan a micidakay a kongko o sayaway a micidekay a kongko o sayaway a micidekay a kongko no He-li-aw-po-li-si o sayaway a micidekay a kongko no He-er-mo-po-li-si o sayaway a micidekay a kongko no Meng-fei-si o sayaway a micidekay a kongko no Ti-pi-si
